summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas Area Partnership to End and Prevent Homelessness Local Government Corporation (DAP) and the Citizen Homelessness Commission (CHC) will hold a joint meeting on February 1, 2024, from 12:00 PM to 12:30 PM at Dallas City Hall. The purpose of the meeting is to discuss recommendations for improving oversight of homelessness initiatives in Dallas.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Call to Order and Roll Call  
2. Public Comment Session  
3. Discussion on the Hope Report Recommendation regarding the elimination of duplicative oversight committees.

**Important Details**:  
The primary focus of the meeting will be a discussion led by DAP Chair Cara Mendelsohn and CHC Vice Chair LeTitia Owens on the Hope Report's recommendation to streamline oversight by eliminating redundant committees. This proposal aims to enhance efficiency in addressing homelessness in the Dallas area.

**Action Items**:  
The meeting seeks to gather public input and ultimately decide on the recommendation to eliminate duplicative oversight committees. Participants are encouraged to provide comments, and decisions regarding this proposal will be made during the discussion segment. 

The meeting will be conducted in compliance with public health protocols, and attendees can join either in person or virtually via WebEx.
